headerDisplay: Homebridge/HOOBS plugin to control ECOVACS Deebot devices.
footerDisplay: For help and support please visit our [GitHub Wiki](https://github.com/bwp91/homebridge-deebot/wiki).

countryCode.title: Country Code
countryCode.description: Select your two letter country code where your ECOVACS account is registered, or select 'OTHER' if your country is not listed.

username.title: ECOVACS Username
username.description: The username for your ECOVACS account.

password.title: ECOVACS Password
password.description: The password for your ECOVACS account.

debug.title: Debug Logging
debug.description: If enabled, more information will be added to the Homebridge logs.

refreshTime.title: Refresh Timer
refreshTime.description: An interval (in seconds) in which your devices will refresh with ECOVACS.

lowBattThreshold.title: Low Battery Threshold
lowBattThreshold.description: The battery percentage at which Homebridge should display a low battery status.

motionDuration.title: Alert Notification Time
motionDuration.description: The length of time (in seconds) that the motion detector in Homebridge will be activated if your Deebot sends a message or needs help. The message sent is viewable in the Homebridge logs.

hideBattHumidity.title: Hide Battery Humidity Sensor
hideBattHumidity.description: If enabled, the humidity sensor showing the battery percentage will be hidden.

layout.title: Required Settings
layout.description: These are the basic settings that are required for this plugin to work.

layout.title: Optional Settings
layout.description: A variety of optional settings for general use of this plugin.
